name: Shield Companion (AA)
components: V, S, F (a pair of platinum rings worth 50 gp worn by both you and the target)
target: your animal companion, familiar, or fiendish servant
text: This spell functions as shield other but affects only the caster’s animal companion or familiar. Spellcasters from classes that do not normally gain an animal companion, familiar, or fiendish servant but who gain one through an alternate class feature, archetype, or prestige class can prepare and cast this spell as a 1st-level spell if they are capable of casting spells.
target_zh: 你的动物伙伴、魔宠或者魔物仆从（fiendish servant）
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同护卫他人（shield other）一般，不过只能影响施法者的动物伙伴或魔宠。通常不会获得动物伙伴、魔宠或者魔物仆从（fiendish servant）的施法者，但是由替换职业能力、变体职业能力或者进阶职业获得上述生物的角色，并且能够施法的话，就能够将该法术作为1级法术施放。
